1.content: So, who will you start with?
1.title: The beginning.

11.content:
BEEP BEEP BEEP

You wake up to the sound of your alarm clock. As you groggily wake up, you slip and fall on some clothes on the ground with a

SPLAT!

"Ughh. why did I have to get this virus?? Everything is a damn joke. I better start reforming before..."

SLAM

Your sister walks in.

"Well, well, well little brother. I see your having a rough morning!"

"Leave me alone Melissa. I'm not in the mood." you replied.

"Well, that's too bad Mike, because I definitely am. I know you stole $50 from my purse, you loser." your sister told you.

:.... I was going to give it back... I was just hungry and.."

"Hungry? How does a snack get hungry?" Your sister laughed.

"Stop it you bitch! I am NOT A DAMN SNACK!!!" you yelled back.

"Really? Because you tasted great yesterday. I should take this opportunity to send you back on that trip but clearly it didn't teach you a lesson. I know what will though.... How about we treat my best friend Nicole to a little treat today?" your sister asked with a dark grin.

"You wouldn't dare..." you said. You absolutely hated Nicole. She was a self-centered egotistical bitch and the LAST person whose stomach... and butt.. you'd want to end up in.

"Shouldn't have stolen again." Your sister said as she scraped you off the ground with her fingers, taking you to the kitchen.

"You know little bro, you've always tasted so sweet. And because I'm so sweet and thoughtful, I think we should make Nicole some EXTRA sweet pancakes. That's a great idea!!"

Before you could protest, she threw you into some pancake batter she prepared. She clearly planned this.

beating you into the mixture, you became unrecognizable. Soon after the baking process, you looked like any other stack of pancakes.

"MMMMMM little bro, I outdid myself. You. Smell. Incredible. We're going to make her morning!" your sister told you.

Her morning, not even her whole day, you thought. You were unable to speak due to not having any facial features.

So your sister packaged you into some Tupperware and headed to school. Once she got there, she went straight to Nicole's locker before you got too cold.

"Hey girl!!" your sister shouted

"Whats up!!!" Replied Nicole.

"Well, I was just thinking of you today and wanted to be sweet. I hope your hungry because I made you some breakfast!!" your sister shrieked.

"Oh my god that was so sweet!! You know a beautiful bitch like me needs a good breakfast!! Let me see!!" Nicole yelled.

Soon you felt yourself being lifted out of your sisters bag. The blue lid opens up, and you are disgusted to see the giant face of your worst enemy, Nicole. She looks at you as if you were a delicious dessert and she hadn't eaten in days. You can literally see her drooling at your very sight. Your sister hands her a fork and knife.

Does she dig in now, or save you for later?
11.title: Nicole

111.content:
"Oh my god girl I am starving!!!! Gimme gimme gimme!"

Nicole practically rips the fork and knife from your sister. You absolutely hate both of them. You tremble with fear knowing there is nothing you can do at this point. Unless a miracle happens, all roads go through Nicole. You look up at her, and for a second, you feel like breakfast.

"Whoa calm down girl!! I know you love my pancakes! Come sit with me by the cafeteria before class and enjoy your fresh breakfast! Eat every bite!" Your sister fought back her laughter,

"Oh don't even worry girl, I am starving. And from the second I smelled these pancakes, my mouth has been watering. What did you put in these? Cinnamon? They look and smell absolutely incredible! I needed this so I can have energy for cheerleading practice! I am the captain of course!" Nicole proudly states as they walk over to the cafeteria.

"I put a little extra sugar and a special ingredient in there! You'll have to guess what it is though!" Your sister says


"I bet I'll get it!" Nicole reaches for the fork and knife as they find a seat.

You look up, listening to an oblivious Nicole compliment your scent while bits of her drool fall down on you. Your face was mixed into the top pancake, so you have a full view of Nicole as she enjoys you, her morning treat.

You see a fork dressed in Nicole's hand head towards where your ear would be. Slowly, she pushes the fork through layers of your pancake flesh. while sawing a piece of you off with the knife. You look up into her hungry, predator eyes and any hope you have left is lost. This is clearly a very, very hungry girl and even if you could stop this, you start to feel like that would be selfish. At least one of you is enjoying this, you think. The excitement on her face is obvious, and her beauty distracts you as she finished cutting off her first piece of you.

You watch as slowly, a part of you is brought up to her mouth. She makes eye-contact with her piece the whole way up, slowly opening her mouth as she begins to try her first bite of MikeCakes. You see the part of you disappear between her lips as her eyes close, savoring that delectable bite. She was so enamored with your flavor that her eyes shot wide open after a second of tasting you.

"OH MY GOD! These are incredible! Omg omg omg!! You have to give me this recipe girl! Its rich, creamy and just fluffy enough. I wish you could make me these every day!" Nicole yelled. You can feel your ear swirling around in her mouth as she spoke.

"Anytime you want babe! Just text me the night before!" You heard your sister laugh. She knows that the idea of being Nicole's favorite breakfast item would strike fear into you. Especially considering the trip I you have to make. Which at this point, is almost certain to happen again now.

Nicole looked down on you, eyes even larger than before. Soon enough, you saw the knife and fork rise again. This is going to be a long meal, you thought.

Chunk after chunk, piece after piece, Nicole eagerly scooped you into her waiting mouth, chewed you up, savored you, and swallowed. Each time, she emitted a loud moan or remark about your flavor in between talks of boys and the bachelor with your sister. Your sister watched intently as her best friend happily gobbled up her brother, jealous that she didn't choose to enjoy him.

Eventually, Nicole reached the piece containing your field of vision. You looked up as a fork pierced you in between the eyes. You managed to sneak a peak at Nicole's hungry, merciless, predatory eyes before the fork was spun around and you began heading for her open mouth backwards, eager to get this over with.

You long gave up on any chance of being saved. You resigned yourself to being breakfast for this bratty, popular bbw. You at least find solace in the fact that, judging by her reactions to you, that you are a damn good breakfast. You find some joy in that as you see the her lips pass you by as you enter her mouth. In the distance, you see a blurry image of your sister smiling as she watched Nicole extend you to the back of her mouth.

It's warm, moist, and smells of maple syrup in Nicole's mouth. You look up and see her palate, something you will surely be acquainted with soon enough. You look forward as Nicole begins to close her mouth, removing the fork.

"This is it." You think as all light comes to a halt and you fall flat on her giant, warm, salivating tongue. The heat from her mouth practically melting you.. As you look up at the palate you notice is getting closer.

Nicole slams you against the roof of her mouth.

MMMMMmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm

She moans as she savors your flavor. She can tell theres something special about this bite.

She sucks and sucks on you while you feel her saliva penetrating your form, soaking into you and breaking you apart from the inside out.

Her tongue pushes you under her molars as she begins chewing you up, letting out plenty of moans as your mashed up form is mercilessly pounded by her teeth, forcing bits and pieces of flavor to sprinkle around her mouth.'

"Seriothly the betht pancakes everrr" Nicole says, still chewing you up.

Soon after Nicole compliments your flavor, her tongue begins collecting bits of you from around her mouth. You feel your mashed up, slimy, spit coated form being balled up by her tongue.

"...at least you enjoyed me Nicole.." You mentally sob as a giant

GULP

sends you squeezed through a tight tube, sending you on your journey through Nicole.
111.title: Bon appetite

1112.content:
You are mercilessly squeezed through Nicole's tight throat, being forcefully pushed where all of her meals go.. After all, you are her breakfast. You feel as though this must be what toothpaste feels like being squeezed out of the tube.

The pressure is intense, her body temperature is hot enough to start melting you. You feel her lungs expanding as she breathes. Most chillingly, you begin to hear her heartbeat, growing in volume as you pass it.

Every now and then, you hear another muffled "MMMMmmmm" as you approach her stomach, you hear,

"Honestly, this was the tastiest breakfast I've ever had. I could eat this every day!" Muffled from her flesh, you mentally cry as your captor describes how much she enjoyed devouring you. You hate how delicious you are. You feel that it is unfair that the people who choose to make you their snack get rewarded with your flavor. You've never tasted yourself, but many people refer to you as their "favorite treat" and you shudder every time.

At last, you're squeezed through the opening in her stomach. You fall with a SPLASH into a pool of your own body. The heat is intense and you immediately feel the more digested parts of you bubbling up. Its an odd feeling, and one you never get used to. The smell is of stale vomit and maple syrup, the only hint of your existence. As you lay in the pool of half digested you-- you listen to her beating heart and faint moans. Occasionally, you hear her her laugh. All the while, the rest of your pancake form begins to drop in as she continues enjoying her special breakfast.

You hear her pat her belly as the last of you drops into her stomach. A loud burp is heard even from your position. By now, your consciousness has gained the shape of the pancake soup you've become. You feel like any liquid, as you sloshed around her gut with her every move, pat, laugh and burp. Soon enough, you find yourself violently sloshing around as Nicole gets up to go to class.
1112.title: Your POV

11121.content:
"WHY ME???" You think to yourself.


I HAVE to reform. I can't get digested by Nicole! That would be the most embarrassing thing ever!"

You were fooling yourself. At your state, there was only one way out of Nicole, and Nicole never throws up a good meal voluntarily. You were nothing but soup at this point. your form already mixed in with her juice and bagel from earlier.

It hurts to admit it... but you eventually realize you only have one option.

"It's no use... there's no way I'm getting out of this hell hole the way she put me in... I'm going to make sure my sister never lives this down.. I'm going to have to wait this out until... the end.." You shudder

"and hopefully, i can avoid her detection. If I reform fast enough, maybe I can grab onto something before she... flushes.."

You are absolutely humiliated at this thought, but you know that it's your best and only plan. If you get flushed, you may never find your way home! But on the other hand, if Nicole finds you, there is no telling what she will do..

You try to think of other things to distract yourself from your current situation, but every time you succeed, Nicole lets out a loud burp. Being the most popular girl in school, Nicole could practically walk on water. It's one of the reasons you hated her. Even when she burped, the students would celebrate her. It didn't help knowing that this time however, you were the one causing her gas. You knew from previous experiences however, that this gas was nothing compared to what it will become...

After awhile, you finally managed to drift asleep. Her heartbeat rocking you to sleep while she sat through math class. Slowly, as you slept, you began seeping into Nicole's small intestine.

As beautiful and popular as Nicole is, the girl does love to eat and hates being hungry. Being very rich, hunger is not something she is accustomed to. Needless to say, she was very upset when your being left her stomach. Luckily for her, lunch was in 15 minutes.

----


As She sat for lunch, she looked down eagerly at her tray. Today was Mexican day at the school and Nicole took every liberty in selecting her lunch. She had a three-cheese burrito, 6 extra cheesy quesadillas, extra pica-de-gallo, beans ans rice, garlic Chili, and a diet coke. Even a girl as beautiful as Nicole can impress with how quickly she can eat all of that. Within 15 minutes, Nicole went back for seconds. She sat and ate with her friends, casually talking about other students. At one point, someone brought up your name. Nicole heard that halfway through her 5th burrito, put her lunch down and said

"Oh that kid? He's my best friends little brother sure but like... he's kind of a little bitch." The girls laugh out loud.

"LOL girls can you imagine what I'd do to him if I ever found him alone? I could use a little squish bitch!" Nicole and her friends erupted in laughter while Nicole took another bite of her burrito.

---

The jostling of her laughter woke you up abruptly. You didn't know where you were, but you knew you were moving along a tube. You could feel tiny "hairs" grabbing at you, pushing you forward and oddly... absorbing parts of you. You put two and two together and realized that Nicole's body must have pushed you closer to the exit. You surmised that the "hairs" were her villi and you were now officially supplying her with her vitamins, nutrients, protein, antioxidants and beauty mixture, just as any good little meal would do.

You start to notice the weight above you getting heavier. You realized it must have been lunch and mentally sobbed. How could she eat more? Where you not enough for her? You thought. You almost became angry but then realized that more than likely, you and that meal are going to know each other much better pretty soon..
11121.title: Lunch Time

"Yes, your highness." you tell her.

"Goooood boy!! So first and foremost it goes without saying that you belong to me now, okay? I own you yum-yum! You are all mine now and need to accept that! Your going to love life as my favorite treat!!! Secondly, your old name, whatever it was, forget it. You're my yum-yum now only respond to yum-yum! Third, you must always call me your highness. fourth, and most importantly, anytime i'm hungry, or anytime I'm craving you, you are to drop everything and offer yourself to me. I may make you into a dish I want, I may mix you into some takeout, hell, I may just eat you straight up! My yum-yum is good any way"

you couldn't believe what you were hearing.. did this bitch really think you would just resign yourself to being her snack? Her pleasure food? But you knew now was not the time to object..

"Yes your highness. Understood." You humbly utter, much to her satisfaction and a boon to her ego.

"That's it yum yum! Good boy!"

She pets you triumphantly.

"Now do you know what time it is? Breakfast time!! What should I make you into today yum-yum?"
1112111121.title: She takes you into the kitchen

11121111211.content:
You can't believe this.. not only is she expecting you to agree to be her food whenever she demands, she's making you PICK what she eats you as! Has this bitches ego made her gone mad? You think over your options,

The french toast is very labor intensive and takes more time, giving you a better chance to escape.

"Okay your highness, I would very much love to be your french toast this morning, please." You appeal to her ego.

"OOOOOhhhhh I like the attitude yum-yum! French toast it is!"

She grabs you immediately and stuffs you into a container, putting you in the fridge and giving you no time to react.

"Damn... " You thought, realizing your hopes are damaged severely.

Nicole grabs the french toast mix and begins preparing her breakfast, cutting up fruits, making coffee and mixing the french toast mix. Once it is thoroughly mixed, she opens her fridge and takes you out.

"Couldn't have my little yum-yum running off!"

she says as she stuffs you into her microwave, heating you up until your just liquid enough to be poured into the mix.

"Shit shit shit!" You think as you are poured into her french toast mix and sprinkled with brown sugar and cinnamon.

"This is going to be the best french toast ever!!!! Especially with you as the special ingredient yum-yum " Nicole shrieks to you.

She puts you in the oven at 400 degrees for 30 minutes and goes to get ready.
11121111211.title: french toast

111211112111.content:
You finally see the oven door open. You are baked fully into a loaf of french bread. No part of you is visible, but you've retained all of your senses.

As you look outward towards the opening oven door, you see Nicole's hungry, beautiful face peering back at you, oven mits stretched out grabbing onto your tray.

"mmmmmmMMMMMMM you smell even better than the pancakes! Ha! I knew I was a better cook than that bitch!" She says, insulting your sister while practically drooling on you. She picks you up with tongs and sets you onto her plate, right next to some chopped up apples and pineapples and some granola. Nicole walks over to her couch to enjoy her breakfast and some TV before school.

"Alright yum-yum! In my mouth and down the hatch, I'll see you during my next crap!" She sings to you and laughs. She picks you up, slowly bringing you up to her mouth before you see her nose talk one more big sniff of you.

"MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM" you hear.

"please..not again.." you say to no one as Nicole opens her mouth, this time giving you a high definition view of the inside of her mouth, her sparkling teeth, her long tongue and most chillingly, her wet throat.

You begin to mentally sob as you see her take a bite out of your side, chewing you up and looking at you, with Ecstasy in her eyes.

"MMMMMMMmmmmmMmmmmm so much better than the pancakes. You really are the perfect snack, yum-yum." She moans as she sets you back onto her plate. She uses her fork to pick up a few pieces of fruit, dabbing them onto your body to absorb some of your flavor that she is so addicted to. After a few pieces of fruit, you feel your body go airborne once more.

"Oh no. oh no oh no oh no why me? Is this a nightmare" You thought. Sadly no, this was no nightmare. Your reality was staring you right in the face, mouth wide open, drooling and hungry. She is your reality. And you, are her breakfast.

You make contact with her tongue again and feel her moan again. She took another huge bite out of you, chewing you up, savoring, and finally swallowing. You were just so delicious. She knew food will never be the same for her. You made her life so much better already! She thought as she tore a chunk of your french toast body off, popping it into her mouth like cotton candy.

You watch in horror as your worst enemy eats you again. She chews up another part of you while smiling in your face, trying to warm you up to your new life. It is one thing to be eaten by her, you thought, but the fact that she's doing it again and so easily, really made things look grim for your future, and flavorful for hers.

"I am just so happy I ate you yesterday!! It was really meant to be you know!" Nicole says, talking with her mouth full of you.

"You're going to love being princess food, I know it!"

She says, setting you down and drinking some coffee.

After a few more bites, some more taunting and some switching of breakfast items, Nicole finally gets to the section of french toast with your consciousness ingrained in it.

"Please make this a quick trip..." you sob

To add insult to injury, Nicole burps loudly in your face. The smell of french toast emanating from her dirty mouth.

"Wow even your burps taste amazing!" She mocks you.

She quickly pops you into her mouth and begins a familiar process.

"MMMMmmmmmm thats it yum-yum"

Nicole moans as she chews you up, savoring every splash of flavor you offer.

Chew. Chew. Chew. She goes at you relentlessly, her saliva becoming embedded into the mixture that is you. After a few moments of enjoying her breakfast, she proceeded to round you up again, form you into a ball with her tongue, and just like yesterday morning,

Gulp

BBBBBBUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPP

She lets out a very deep belch.

"MMMmmmmm best breakfast item, EVER."
111211112111.title: 30 mins later

1112111121112.content:
You begin your descent down Nicole's throat AGAIN for the second time in 48 hours only this time, she actually did it on purpose. this makes you feel much more humiliated as you begin sliding down her throat, crushed from all sides once more. You hear her heart beating again, making you feel.... at home? Maybe you were losing it..

After a few moments of being squeezed down her throat, a few more audible moans and a loud belch, you splashed back into the pit that is her stomach. You submerged under the soup that is her breakfast, half digested, and then bobbed back to the top of the mixture. Looking up at the roof of her stomach again, you begin to feel her stomach enyzmes working on you, her delicious breakfast.

You see more bits and pieces of fruit, bagel, you, and coffee entering her stomach with you. You begin to panic.

"How am I ever going to get out of this? I can't keep turning into her shit.. but what if she catches me again?" You truly did not know what to do as your thoughts were drowned out by another Nicole burp. You were already making her gassy, which was not a good sign for your immediate future.

You faintly here in the distance,

"You're going to be my food forever, yum-yum. You're never gonna leave me" You hear her gloat and begin to believe her..
1112111121112.title: Your POV

choices: Stick to the plan, you're her yum-yum now!
11121111211121.content:
BBBUUURRPP

Nicole lets out another deep belch.

"MMMmmmmmm. My my yum-yum, you are seriously the tastiest thing I've ever eaten! We really are a match made in heaven Best of all, every time I burp I get to taste you a second time! You're my favorite treat ever You're lucky a princess like me found you too!"

Nicole spoke to you as she ate another piece of your French Toast form. She really did enjoy you. Every bite gave her an unbeatable rush of happiness and joy. Something about you just made her go wild! As far as she was concerned, she could eat you for breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert every day and never tire of you!

You moan in defeat as you hear her words while another chewed up chunk of you falls into her stomach. You listen intently to her voice, her heart beat and her bodily noises. You breath in the sweet, stale stench of vomit and cinnamon while her stomach acids melt you again for the second time in 24 hours. She was your world now. You are at her mercy. A terrifying, sobering realization dawns on you..

"She's right."

"There's nothing I can do. I tried to stop her and.. She just crumpled me up like a dirty rag and threw me into her fridge.. She's too strong. But maybe.. maybe if "

BBBUURRRPP

Nicole interrupts your thought with another burp, reminding you of your current reality.

"what's the point.." you whimper to yourself.

"She's obsessed with me.. and she knows I can't stop her. She's free to do whatever she wants and I can not stop her. "

all of a sudden, a glob of chewed up apple falls into you, splattering your now liquid form around Nicole's stomach.

"Maybe she'll get tired of my flavor? Then maybe she'll let me go! I just need to tough it out and let her enjoy herself a bit and do my best not to upset her until then I guess. She is right in a way. As much as I hate her, at least she isn't some criminal or drug addict.."

You slowly brainwash yourself into making light of your situation when all of a sudden, as if on que, you hear Nicole moan

"MMMmmmmmmm I'll never get over your flavor yum-yum "

You mentally sob as your digested face sinks into your soup-like body.

---

As Nicole finished swallowing her last bite of you, she took one last slice of pineapple and rubbed it on the part of her plate that you once occupied, hoping to salvage one last bite of your exquisite flavor.

"The only thing I hate about you now yum-yum is the fact that there's only so much of you!" Nicole says as she ate the pineapple slice. The chewed up sludge falling into you and soon joining your liquid form in Nicole's belly.

Nicole checks the time on her phone, completely distracted from enjoying her breakfast and TV show.

"SHIT! I"M GONNA BE SOOOOO LATE!!! Mrs. Phillips can NOT give me another tardy!"

Nicole yells as she runs into her bedroom, quickly throwing on some tight black yoga pants and a school sweater. She had no time to dress any better than that. She puts on a pair on converse all-stars, grabs her bag and runs out the door, straight for the school.
---

You just lay there, in utter defeat. At least you were really, really good at being breakfast, you thought. Never in your life have you felt more pathetic. Nicole was TRICKED into eating you by YOUR OWN SISTER. And after finding out, she gave you the most traumatic experience in your life by transforming you into her shit and shitting you out into her toilet. Not only that, but here you are, again digesting in her stomach alongside common breakfast foods because SHE made the decision to have you for breakfast again and even plans to keep you as her personal treat. Defeated, crushed and hopeless, you look up as another chunk of pineapple falls into you and you hear Nicole burp.

All of a sudden your world is jostled around. Your soup-like body is mixed around like a hurricane as you hear Nicole's heart beat rise.

Up, Down, Up, Down, Side to Side, Inside out, your mixed all sorts of ways as Nicole runs to school. This is a sensation that will take plenty of getting used to..

---


Nicole rushes straight to her class, not even stopping at her locker to put away her bag. She rushes in 2 minutes late.

"Miss Nicole. Glad you can join us." Mrs. Phillips says sarcastically as she points Nicole to her seat.

"Sorry Mrs. Phillips.." Nicole said sweetly, showing off her undeniably loveable charm that seemed to work on everyone at your school.

"Oh Nicole! You sweetheart. Have a seat and enjoy yourself." Mrs. Phillips smiles back at her.

Nicole proceeds to her seat. Coincidentally, your sister is seated right behind her. Your sister texts her,

"So did you enjoy my bitch of a brother? XD"

Does Nicole stick to her plan, or tell the truth?
11121111211121.title: Nicole is late for class

choices: Nicole has to take a quick bathroom break
111211112111211.content:
"Wait what?"

Nicole plays dumb.

"OMG you bitch!! Don't play dumb with me!" Your sister texts back.

"Uhm boo.. I'm so sorry but.. we should have this convo outside of class" Nicole replies.

"okaayy.." Your sister replies.
---

You sit in Nicole' stomach, finally at rest.

"Finally! That was intense. I would have thrown up if.. if I wasn't already Nicole's vomit.." You insult yourself in sadness.

You sat there, hopeless. Your body has been entirely liquefied, with no part of you, the fruit, the granola or the coffee being recognizable. As far as anyone is concerned, you're all just Nicole's breakfast. A healthy part of her daily nutrition. Your purpose being; be delicious, be eaten, be still, be digested and then be shit out as easily as possible. You tried not to think that way, but how could you avoid it? She is literally all around you, and you are well on your way to seeing her insides for the second time. And deep, deep down in you, you're beginning to believe her..

Just then, you feel her lower valve open. Her lower intestine is eager to see you again, ready to enhance Nicole's beauty even more. Maybe she's right.. maybe you two are a match made in heaven.. or maybe, you're delirious from the trauma of the past two days. Either way, you slowly begin to flow into Nicole's intestines as she sits through class.

---

"So hey girl! What's up?" Your sister asks Nicole

"So like... about yu- I mean Mike.. Girl I am SO SORRY. Please forgive me!! Pleeeaasssee?" Nicole said, emphasizing that last word with her trademark smile and charm.

"Girl there's nothing to forgive! You're like my sister I love you! No worries boo, now what's wrong??"

That put Nicole's mind at ease, this will be easier than she thought!

"So like, with cheer-leading practice and tests coming up like I am just sooooo stressed girl and I TOTALLY forgot about Mike and flushed him away! I swear honest mistake!!" Nicole gave your sister her best puppy dog eyes.

Your sister pauses for a moment.

".........
...
....
BAHAAHAHHAHAHAAAAHHHAAAhAHAHAHA No way!!! Girl that's hilarious!!!" Your sister bursts out laughing, Nicole joins her in laughing at you as you bubble away in Nicole's small intestines.

"Did you shit yet? Because you look like you've enjoyed some of his benefits!" Your sister asks, gasping for air from laughing so hard while slapping Nicole's enlarged ass, causing it to jiggle seductively.

Nicole realizes this is her chance to seal the deal.. and your fate with her.

"hahahahah OOOOHHHhhh yeah girl! I literally could not stop shitting! TMI but I was on the toilet for like 20 minutes! And GGGGIIIIIIIRRRRRRRRRRLLLLL did it REEK!!! Rotten garbage and cabbage smells better than that! I was soooooo eager to flush it away to get the smell out! It was so rank and cheesy and thick and .."

"OKAY girl you're painting a portrait and I'm a very visual person!!" Your sister laughs.

"I'm sure he'll turn up eventually! I'll tell my parents he went away with a friend or something. I got you girl! Sisters 4ever " Your sister says as she hugs Nicole, unaware that she is inches away from you.

"This is why you're my best friend boo Love you!! Sorry I have to run though!! Catch up after lunch?" Nicole asks.

"Of course boo! See ya then!" Your sister replies. Nicole heads on her way to her next class. Her class didn't start for 15 minutes, but she knew to quit while she was ahead.

"Hear that, yum-yum? It's official now, you're all mine forever "
---

You completely broke down.

Nicole won. You heard everything. Not only did your sister fall for Nicole's obvious lie but she seemed to not even care! She seemed to love Nicole even more than she loved her own brother! You feel Nicole pat her abdomen as you slosh through her small intestine. You feel her gut absorbing more of your nutrients. At least you're a part of something bigger, you thought. You liquid form feels energized, as you continuously produce vitamins and nutrients to be absorbed by her. It seems as though your body has already accepted your new role as Nicole's food. You cry in defeat as you move through Nicole's gut, air bubbles already beginning to form..

What happens next?
111211112111211.title: Stick to the plan, you're her yum-yum now!

info.brief_description: You're a young man with a mysterious illness in an uncaring world.
info.description:
A mysterious illness has spread around the entire planet causing only men to shrink to about 3 feet tall, become completely squishy and malleable and decrease their upper body strength. This illness, dubbed the GT-5 virus, seemed to target only men. While the virus spread at record pace, scientists tried their best to find a cure, but failed to do so. The illness was non-fatal, and actually gave the infected near invulnerability. There have been countless records of men being stepped on, ran over, set on fire, and even eaten alive (many times) and surviving without incident. Society began to adjust accordingly. Soon, the world was led by women.


Men still held roles in the workforce and even in power in some cases, but their presence was greatly diminished as the outside world became dangerous. What was worse, was the fact that the illness had many other effects. Women began to notice that the men seemed to smell absolutely irresistible. Not in a fashion sense, but more in a hunger-starved scent of food-sense. It didn't take long for women to discover that not only did they smell irresistible, but tasted absolutely incredible. With women in power and relative safety, the tinies soon became the favored snack among women. It was found that they offered every nutrient and worked as an excellent protein supplement and even helped with crystal clear skin and body positivity. It didn't help that challenges such as the "Cheetah Challenge" gained major popularity, where a female would sneak up, pounce on and eat a male while on video. Anyway, with the background out of the way, you are Mike, an unfortunate male in this world. Your story depends on which female character you chose to start with.

Nicole- (you would be in high school)- Big boobs, big ass. Dark Skin (Italian) with brown eyes and brown hair. She is the most popular girl at your school, and would do anything for attention. She definitely has a narcissistic attitude and a special dislike for you.

Rachel- (Early college)- Fair-skin, light brown hair, big ass. She is your best friend. Although, she does seem to enjoy your situation quite a bit...

Prushna- (You would be in your mid-20's)- Woman you work with. About 26 years old, dark skinned with black hair. Athletic. She is very bossy, very rude and never likes to be bothered. She is not your boss, but don't tell her that!

Jackie- (mid 20's)- Light skinned mexican girl, big ass. 23 years old, she works with you as well, but she is much nicer than Prushna... or is she?

Caitlyn- (Early 30's) - Fair skin- 28- black hair with a big ass. She works at the gym you go to and is always eyeing you. Do you dare talk to her?


**This is predominantly a vore/full-tour story. Every aspect of full tour, including disposal, is strongly encouraged. It does not have to be the only situation you end up in, but should work up to it. You can not die. Things encouraged are: Full tour vore, toilet fetish, farts, ass, feet. absolutely no men involved other than the main character. No one sentence chapters either. Each female character must have you for at least 3 vore incidents before switching to any other female character. Feel free to add any new female characters after the initial characters 3rd "meal".

Enjoy!
